scripts.dx:run: npm-run-all -s dx:prepare lint:ci format:check docs:lint docs:links ts:check storybook:build
scripts.agents:seo:validate: npm run agents:seo:guardrails && npm run agents:seo:lighthouse
scripts.seo:validate: npm run seo:guardrails && npm run seo:lighthouse
scripts.build:legacy: npm run generate-projects && npm run fetch:assets && npm run copy:fonts && npm run optimize && node scripts/rev.mjs
scripts.build:dist:sri: node scripts/generate-sri.mjs --root dist --html index.html --assets dist --manifest dist/sri-manifest.json
scripts.postbuild: npm run build:sri && npm run sitemap:gen && npm run sitemap:lint
scripts.pw:changed: node -e "const cp=require('child_process');const f=cp.execSync('git diff --name-only main...').toString().split('\n').filter(p=>/\.spec\.(t|j)sx?$/.test(p)); if(!f.length){console.log('No changed specs');process.exit(0)} cp.spawnSync(process.platform==='win32'?'pnpm.cmd':'pnpm',['exec','playwright','test','--project=chromium','--workers=24','--reporter=line',...f],{stdio:'inherit'})"
scripts.test:dev: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=0 REQUIRE_CSS_200=0 REQUIRE_STATUS_PILL_STRICT=0 playwright test
scripts.test:strict: cross-env REQUIRE_CSS_200=1 REQUIRE_STATUS_PILL_STRICT=1 PLAYWRIGHT_STRICT_STREAM=1 playwright test
scripts.test:smoke: cross-env REQUIRE_CSS_200=0 REQUIRE_STATUS_PILL_STRICT=0 npx playwright test -g "stylesheet|status pill|summary|ping|csp|root html mime|bundle wiring"
scripts.test:smoke:static: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=0 REQUIRE_CSS_200=0 REQUIRE_STATUS_PILL_STRICT=0 npx playwright test -g "stylesheet|status pill|summary|ping|csp|root html mime|bundle wiring"
scripts.test:backend:full: cross-env WAIT_SERVER_MS=120000 WAIT_SERVER_INTERVAL_MS=1000 WAIT_PRIMARY_MS=120000 WAIT_PRIMARY_META_TIMEOUT_MS=5000 WAIT_CHAT_MS=20000 WAIT_SSE_MS=90000 WAIT_SSE_ATTEMPT_MS=30000 playwright test -g "@backend" --reporter=line
scripts.test:backend:req: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=1 WAIT_SERVER_MS=120000 WAIT_SERVER_INTERVAL_MS=1000 WAIT_PRIMARY_MS=120000 WAIT_PRIMARY_META_TIMEOUT_MS=5000 WAIT_CHAT_MS=20000 WAIT_SSE_MS=90000 WAIT_SSE_ATTEMPT_MS=30000 playwright test -g "@backend" --reporter=line
scripts.test:backend:req:flaky: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=1 ALLOW_STREAM_FLAKY=1 WAIT_SERVER_MS=120000 WAIT_SERVER_INTERVAL_MS=1000 WAIT_PRIMARY_MS=120000 WAIT_PRIMARY_META_TIMEOUT_MS=5000 WAIT_CHAT_MS=20000 WAIT_SSE_MS=90000 WAIT_SSE_ATTEMPT_MS=30000 playwright test -g "@backend" --reporter=line
scripts.test:backend:req:soft: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=1 WAIT_PRIMARY_SOFT=1 WAIT_PRIMARY_LOG=1 WAIT_SERVER_MS=180000 WAIT_SERVER_INTERVAL_MS=1000 WAIT_PRIMARY_MS=120000 WAIT_PRIMARY_META_TIMEOUT_MS=5000 WAIT_CHAT_MS=20000 WAIT_SSE_MS=90000 WAIT_SSE_ATTEMPT_MS=30000 playwright test -g "@backend" --reporter=line
scripts.test:backend:req:stream: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=1 PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 ALLOW_STREAM_FLAKY=1 STREAM_LATENCY_LOG=1 WAIT_SSE_MS=120000 WAIT_SSE_ATTEMPT_MS=45000 playwright test -g "@backend chat stream" --reporter=line
scripts.test:backend:guard-emb: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=1 MAX_OPENAI_EMBED_PCT=30 EMBED_GUARD_RUNS=10 playwright test -g "@backend embeddings guardrail" --project=chromium --reporter=line
scripts.test:backend:chat-backends: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=1 playwright test -g "@backend chat backends JSON" --project=chromium --reporter=line
scripts.test:fast: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 PW_JSON=0 npx playwright test --project=chromium -g "@frontend|routing smoke" --max-failures=1
scripts.test:badge: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 npx playwright test tests/e2e/route-badge.spec.ts --project=chromium
scripts.test:fast+badge: npm run test:fast && npm run test:badge
scripts.test:changed: git diff --name-only origin/main...HEAD | grep -E '^(src|tests)/' && pwsh ./scripts/test-all.ps1 -FrontendOnly || echo 'No relevant changes detected'
scripts.test:security: cross-env EXPECT_EDGE=1 NGINX_STRICT=1 playwright test -g "CSP baseline|security headers drift|manifest|no 4xx|html-no-inline|dom-no-inline-styles|dom-no-inline-handlers|assets-immutable" --reporter=line
scripts.test:frontend-smoke: cross-env BACKEND_REQUIRED=0 playwright test -g "stylesheet|status pill|root html mime|bundle wiring|csp"
scripts.test:assistant:ui: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 npx playwright test -g "@frontend assistant UI" --reporter=line
scripts.test:assistant:fallback: npx playwright test -g "@frontend assistant UI fallback" --project=chromium
scripts.test:backend:stream-yields: npx playwright test -g "@backend stream yields assistant text" --project=chromium
scripts.test:mime-smoke: cross-env NGINX_STRICT=1 playwright test -g "mime smoke|root html mime|cache smoke"
scripts.strict-local: npm run build:prod && cross-env BASE=http://localhost:5178 REQUIRE_CSS_200=1 REQUIRE_STATUS_PILL_STRICT=1 PLAYWRIGHT_STRICT_STREAM=1 npm run serve:dist
scripts.strict-local:test: npm run build:prod && cross-env BASE=http://localhost:5178 REQUIRE_CSS_200=1 REQUIRE_STATUS_PILL_STRICT=1 PLAYWRIGHT_STRICT_STREAM=1 start-server-and-test serve:dist http://localhost:5178 e2e
scripts.smoke:pr: playwright test -g "stylesheet|status pill|summary|ping|root html mime|bundle wiring"
scripts.guard:all: npm run lint && npm run test:security && echo Guards OK
scripts.assets:baseline:force: npm run verify:static && cross-env FORCE=1 node scripts/update-asset-baseline.mjs
scripts.e2e:eval: cross-env BASE=http://127.0.0.1:5178 API_BASE=http://127.0.0.1:8023 WS_CMD="npm run -s serve:dist" playwright test tests/e2e/eval-run-sets.spec.ts -c playwright.config.ts
scripts.e2e:eval:proxy: cross-env BASE=http://127.0.0.1:5178 WS_CMD="npm run -s serve:dist:proxy" playwright test tests/e2e/eval-run-sets.spec.ts --project=chromium --reporter=line
scripts.test:analytics: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 PW_SKIP_WS=1 BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 playwright test -g "@analytics" --project=chromium --reporter=line
scripts.test:analytics-beacons: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 PW_SKIP_WS=1 BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 playwright test tests/e2e/analytics-beacons.spec.ts --project=chromium --reporter=line
scripts.e2e:feedback:proxy: start-server-and-test "http-server dist -p 5191 -P http://127.0.0.1:8001" http://127.0.0.1:5191 "cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 BASE=http://127.0.0.1:5191 API_BASE=http://127.0.0.1:5191 playwright test tests/e2e/feedback.spec.ts --project=chromium --reporter=line --timeout=120000"
scripts.e2e:guardrails:proxy: cross-env PLAYWRIGHT_GLOBAL_SETUP_SKIP=1 WS_CMD="npx http-server ./dist -p 5186 -P http://127.0.0.1:8001" BASE=http://127.0.0.1:5186 API_BASE=http://127.0.0.1:5186 playwright test tests/e2e/guardrails-injection.spec.ts --project=chromium --reporter=line --timeout=120000
